review.reviewBody: We ordered a variey of pizzas, pastas, and appetizers and our whole family loved everything! The Meatballs, Bruschetta, Superb Sopressata (New Addition), and Prosciutto Burrata were our faves and we cant wait to order from Captain's Oven again.

We ordered the pepperoni pizza and my kids said it the best pizza they have ever had. Definitely worth the money and our new go to pizza place.  
I also got the capri salad for myself and it was amazing.
the pizza had good flavour but was ice cold .... it wasn't even a little bit warm...
Pizza was so good. Had the truffle mushroom pizza. It was unreal.
Amazing pizza, love the garlic sauce as well!
